      • convert

        public static double convert(double x,
                             double dmax,
                             double dmin,
                             double pmax,
                             double pmin)
        performs the convertion of x from scale dmax-dmin to scale pmax-pmin
        Parameters:
        x - the value to be converted
        dmax - the original maximum scale value
        dmin - the original minimum scale value
        pmax - the new maximum scale value
        pmin - the new minimum scale value
        Returns:
        the calculation x * (dmax - dmin) / (pmax - pmin)

      • map

        public static double map(double x,
                         double in_min,
                         double in_max,
                         double out_min,
                         double out_max)
        performs the mapping of x from scale dmax-dmin to scale pmax-pmin
        Parameters:
        x - the value to be converted
        in_min - the original maximum scale value
        in_max - the original minimum scale value
        out_min - the new maximum scale value
        out_max - the new minimum scale value
        Returns:
        the mapped value
